channel.title: installation on new/s/leak
channel.description: Recent content in installation on new/s/leak

item.description: Development setup Follow the instructions for the user installation to get a working hoover and newsleak installation. Clone the newsleak Github repository git clone https://github.com/uhh-lt/newsleak.git Preprocessing pipeline The preprocessing pipeline is a Java-based Maven project using Apache UIMA a base technology for information extraction. Start dev service containers Stop the newsleak containers from the docker user setup (step 1 above) and restart them with the dev container orchestration:
